description: A Dart class 'CommunityProvider' that manages community leaderboard data by fetching from mock services and notifies listeners on updates.

classes.name: CommunityProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier provider managing community leaderboard data, allowing refresh and notifying listeners on changes.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Asynchronously refreshes the leaderboard data by re-fetching from mock services and notifies listeners.
